case_address_found_1: 3.4 miles South of Vegas Valley Drive
case_circumstances: On 07/29/1986, this person was found lying on a piece of cardboard in the open area south of Vegas Valley Dr. on Hollywood Blvd. He was covered with a small piece of black Visqueen. He was decomposed and appeared to be toothless.
case_head_hair: Brown, slightly graying, up to 1" in length
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Black trousers (European Media Sportswear label), brown belt, orange jacket with "Giants" logo, one black sock, one blue sock, two white socks with red and black stripes, an orange and white striped T-shirt, and white thermal underwear cut-offs.
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
